name: Formation Soccer '98: Ganbare Nippon in France
overview: After the releases of the SNES & N64 games Formation Soccer '98 - Ganbare Nippon in France is the third game for Playstation One, the game features the national teams that had entered the World Cup '98, and a new different camera angle. The game features 3 difficulty levels (easy, normal & hard), 32 national teams and these game modes: - Exhibition: Play against another human player or against the computer - World Cup: Select a team and try to win the World Cup - Human Cup: Select a team and try to win the Human Cup
